name: CAO - Flathead V19 - Carb
additionalNotes: Rick Rodriguez and the CAO team decided to develop a cigar blending a Connecticut Broadleaf wrapper, a hearty Connecticut Habano binder, and a bold selection of independently-grown Nicaraguan and Dominican tobaccos. Handmade using an abbreviated fermentation to lock in the tobacco’s native flavors and added a longer aging process to refine them. Some may confuse it with the original Flathead, but the V19 has a kick of their own.
